description:
######Version 1.2.0, Added backup feature, now you can send logs to your mail.#######  

ABOUT
•	Tracking your asthma level  helps you and your doctor to control asthma and its many Health related issues.
•	The Asthma Tracker simplifies asthma data logging.
•	This app will allow you to enter the multiple asthma readings at different times of a day.
•	 This app saves the peakflow, time of the measurement and note.
•	In addition to being a convenient data logger the software is also a voluble tool for peakflow longitudinal trends analysis using graphs.
•	 This app will allow you to search logs by note.
•	Very easy to use.

  Features:
•	The intuitive interface for data logging.
•	Oversized numbers for easy data entry.
•	Monitor the changes of peakflow over time on the longitudinal graphs.
•	This app will allows you to send logs to doctor. 
•	Very simple and easy to use.
